content.title: Volt MX App
content.body:
1. Connect your mobile device to your computer using a USB cable.
    For Android mobile device, ensure that the use of USB is Transfer files.
    For iOS mobile device, ensure that a trust has been established between your device and your computer.
  2. Launch the Volt MX App on your mobile device.
  3. Select the USB tab.
  4. On successful connection, the Iris on your computer shows a success prompt.
